pageTitle: Deputy Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, January 8, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Peace River, Alberta

2:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Peace River, Tom Tarpey.

Peace River Town Hall
9911 100 Street

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting.
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:45 p.m.
